snippet: An extremist group believed linked to Al Qaeda’s North Africa arm claimed responsibility for the attack that killed at least 14 soldiers, the authorities said Thursday.
abstract: Militants attack army posts in western Tunisia, killing 14 soldiers; extremist group believed to be linked to Al Qaeda's North Africa arm claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: An extremist group believed linked to Al Qaeda’s North Africa arm claimed responsibility for the attack that killed at least 14 soldiers, the authorities said Thursday.

headline.main: Tunisia: Militants Hit Soldiers in Deadly Attack
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Militants Hit Soldiers in Attack

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
